message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to your needs, and we are confident it will significantly contribute to your company's success.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I believe the product has potential, the price point is a bit high for me at the moment. I'd be willing to consider purchasing it for $850,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget while still valuing our product's unique benefits, I am pleased to offer you the product for $900,000. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise that could facilitate a successful partnership between us.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  To be totally transparent, my budget caps out at $875,000. If you can meet that, I'm ready to close the deal.
